relnotes.name: Bluetooth Manager

defect.title: .esk and .cmi files do not have header

relnotes.defect: Change ASSERTs to ASSERT_DEBUGs throughout bluetooth

defect.title: [upf31] Error on authentication complete fails speculative authentications

relnotes.defect: Refactored the logic to check if encryption is required over handling an error
Add missing library to mmp file for panprovider.dll

defect.title: [upf31] Secman state machine does not handle link being brought up encrypted

relnotes.defect: Handle the EncryptionChangeComplete that is generated when we bring up link encrypted
Added coverity code annotation to avoid this false positive.

defect.title: Bonding fails but pairing works with iVoicePro

relnotes.defect: Added a new error code for dedicated bonding attempt failure.
Remove refTSP from top level bluetooth bld.inf.
Remove unused code and improve maintainability of code

defect.title: CBR filter src warning related to bluetooth_common in M04569 v9.5
